## Stock Categories

```{r read_data}
cats <- read.taf("report/StockCategories.csv")
```

```{r table}
  caption <- ""
  datatable(cats,
            escape = FALSE,
            caption = tags$caption(style = "caption-side: bottom; text-align: center;", em(caption)),
            rownames = FALSE,
            options = list(pageLength = 100,
                           autoWidth = TRUE,
                           dom = "ftp")
            )
```
